value: Establishing Connections Among Asia Through Viktor Tsoi's Work
JP SUBTITLE JP SUBTITLE JP SUBTITLE JP SUBTITLE JP SUBTITLE JP SUBTITLE

Join us for a screening of The Needle, with the presence of its director, Rachid Nougmanov. The event will also have lectures about the connections among Viktor Tsoi, Kino, and Asia, and will have very special international guests, who will participate in round tables with the audience.
